MOKI YACHT FOR CHARTER FROM MONACO
86.29ft /26.30m | CERRI Cantieri Navali | 2008 / 2018 The 86.29ft /26.30m Cerri 86' Flyingsport 'Moki' was built in 2008 by CERRI Cantieri Navali and last refitted in 2018. available for charter now from Corsica and Monaco

ACCOMMODATION
Moki's interior layout sleeps up to 10 guests in 4 rooms, including a master suite, 1 VIP stateroom, 2 twin cabins and 2 pullman beds. She is also capable of carrying up to 3 crew onboard to ensure a relaxed luxury yacht experience. Timeless styling, beautiful furnishings and sumptuous seating feature throughout to create an elegant and comfortable atmosphere.

Moki's impressive leisure and entertainment facilities make her the ideal charter yacht for socialising and entertaining with family and friends. Charter from Cannes with delivery fee is possible

PERFORMANCE
This luxury superyacht has a beam of 20.83ft /6.35m and a 1.25ft /.38m draft. Moki is capable of 37 knots flat out, with a cruising speed of 30 knots. perfect for a cruise in Corsica or a round trip.

AMENITIES
Air Conditioning, WiFi connection on board

Base

Corsica, Bonifacio, Calvi, Porto Vecchio, Beaulieu Sur Mer, Cannes, Cap D'ail, Cap Ferrat, Monaco, Nice, Italy Amalfi, Italy Capri, Italy Positano, Italy Salerno, Nord, Sardinia Nord, Italy Naples

from € 5500

J Craft

Accomodation

See description

J Craft is constructed for the fastidious boat-owner who appreciates style and elegance. The boat is endowed with a classic design, which, in combination with the ultra-modern body allows her to achieve high speeds providing comfort for all aboard.

In a J Craft you feel luxurious. Enjoy the large decks and sun platforms, with the generous space under deck. The many exciting equipment-alternatives will transform the boat’s impressive cockpit to a home away from home. The practical size and easy handling leave the small private party with appreciated opportunities for exploring shores and beach clubs.

Unique on every point
J Craft is a successful combination of comfort and beauty. To give the boat the ultimate touch, we have chromium-plated all the brass metal details with a lustre that no material can match.

The Build quality of the Med 48 is second to none and offers luxury both inside and out. She offers spacious decks to the front and rear, as well as very comfortable sunbathing areas. The Sunbeds on the aft deck can be converted for passengers to look either forward or back, as well as into a table.

Accommodation is provided in two en-suite cabins with a centre living area with a television and cooking facilities. She features two double beds and a single bed, ideal for small family charters or to escape from the sun.

Base

FERRAT MASTERCRAFT X30

Specifications

Length 7.1m
Beam 2.6m
Draft 0.74m

Performance

Power 390 hp
Number of guests 10

Accomodation

Guests sleeping 4
See description

Looking for one of the best outdoor activities on the French Riviera. Look no further as you can do any watersports you wish in our newest boat rental. Whether it is water skiing, wake surfing (without rope) or wakeboarding this boat for rent has it all.

The Mastercraft X30 is a high performance boat that is extremely well laid out to make it as comfortable and as fun for you as possible. It has speakers all around it so while you are driving or watching someone try out a water activity you can chill and listen to whatever songs you want. It has comfy seats in the front and back where you can lie out and sunbathe or if the sun is too much for you why not pull out the bimini that will protect you from the sun's harmful rays.

Despite all the comfort in this boat rental the one thing that stands out is its performance as most boats to rent don’t come anywhere close to it. The boat can be used to surf, wakeboard and ski.

t has an extremely intelligent surf system which is tailored to create a symmetrical wave without altering the weight of the boat from side to side which for those looking to give surfing a go this will be the boat rental for you. It is even possible once you are on the wave to let go of the tow rope and surf without holding onto anything.

Base

Antibes Beaulieu Sur Mer, Cap D'ail, Cannes, Cap Ferrat, Eze Sur Mer, Golfe Juan, Marseille, Monaco, Menton, Nice

from € 750

Sacs Stratos

Specifications

Length 12.4m
Beam 3.62m
Draft 0.8m

Performance

Max speed 50 knots
Cruising speed 30 knots
Number of guests 11

Accomodation

Cabins 0
Guests sleeping 0
See description

Launched in 2005 and fitted out with some of the largest engine options available in the Sacs Marine range, GALAXIE is powered by twin Mercruiser 425hp petrol V8’s to offer 50 knot performance with 30 knots easy and economical cruising. Luxuriously fitted out with full teak decking externally and a comfortable double berth plus heads below decks, she is the perfect day-boat with overnight possibilities.

The Sacs Stratos 12 combines high speed with safety and is a great day charter boat, providing all the thrills and speed you would expect from a boat of this class. The hull literally cuts through the waves with good stability. There are two large sun deck areas so ample room for all. The bow sun deck floor is lower than usual, allowing the air chambers to block the air therefore increasing passenger protection. The aft deck is very safe while the boat is in motion, thanks to the handrail that surrounds it. The Stratos 12 also has an open space cabin with a v-shaped bed in the bow. Ideal fun day charter boat. Also depending on itinerary, you can enjoy an hour of fun with the inflatable.

from € 450
